metadata.Title: CVE-2019-15026 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
memcached 1.5.16, when UNIX sockets are used, has a stack-based bufferover-read in conn_to_str in memcached.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-15026` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

memcached - 1.5.6-0ubuntu1.2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: memcached package in esm-infra/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.5.6-0ubuntu1.2').
